name: intermittency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of stopping and starting repeatedly or with periods of time in between: Wind is a problematic source of energy because of its intermittency. The doctor said that it was hard to explain the intermittency of my symptoms.
More examplesFewer examplesThe team was able to overcome the problem of intermittency and deliver continuous power to the motor.We are finding solutions to deal with the intermittency of renewable sources of energy.The patient had experienced palpitations of the heart and intermittency of the pulse.
